show_name: The Erotic Adventures of Tom Thumb! (OAV)
plot: After awakening from a deep sleep and a bizarre dream, Issunbashi finds himself shrunk down to just a few inches in height. He then tries to find out how to get back to his normal size. But it doesn't take long for him to discover that being small has big advantages. Particularly when he can spy on naked girls without their knowledge. And when he finally meets an understanding woman, he's able to explore the female form from entirely unique perspective.
